transcripts.text: And would you ever be willing to house a refugee?

Well, definitely yes, because they need a lot of help, and also new country, new everything, weather new, different from back home, and yeah.  Yeah, why not?  Why not?  Everybody needs help.  Yeah.  And if you are able to help, for sure.
So we actually, we have Mo here with us today.
Mo is new to Canada, and he is looking for... Delighted, nice to meet you.

Toronto Mayor John Tory has recently announced that April is Refugee Rights Awareness Month.  Canadians are told to open their hearts and their arms to refugees with practically no questions asked.  The Radisson Hotel in Toronto has even been nicknamed the Refugee Hotel.  So I'm out in the GTA today to find out exactly how welcoming Canadians really are.  Do you think Canadians should help refugees?
